sentences.sContent: The party was offered a share of government if it forswore violence.
sentences.sCn: 若发誓停用暴力，这个政党即可得到部分行政权。

phrases.pCn: 发伪誓；作伪证；违背誓言

remMethod.val: for(出去) + swear(发誓) → 为了改过自新而发誓 → 誓绝

trans.tranOther: If you forswear something, you promise that you will stop doing it, having it, or using it
